properties.name: bastet.auth.filter.header-key
properties.description: Header used to pass the authentication token to the service.

properties.name: bastet.auth.security-config.root-username
properties.description: The username for the root user.

properties.name: bastet.auth.security-config.root-password
properties.description: The password for the root user.

properties.name: bastet.encryption.gnupg.armored-private-key
properties.description: The GPG Private Key to use for decryption.

properties.name: bastet.encryption.gnupg.armored-public-key
properties.description: The GPG Public Key to use for encryption.

properties.name: bastet.encryption.gnupg.private-key-passphrase
properties.description: The passphrase to use for GPG Private Key.

properties.name: bastet.hash.argon2.bring-your-own-salt
properties.description: Argon2 Salt String. Base64 encoded 16 bytes.
